EXECUTIVE CHEF

SUMMARY

Executive Chef with a two year culinary degree and one year experience in high-pressure culinary environments.
Skilled in preparing large volumes of food quickly and efficiently.
Seeking to use culinary skills and expertise to prepare a special variety of dishes in a professional, rewarding environment.

<JD_START>
Job Title: Executive Chef - 1927639

Location: Kansas City, MO

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Job Description

Looking for an Executive Chef to support major professional sports events! This role involves overseeing chef managers and hourly culinary staff, developing and implementing culinary solutions to meet customer needs, and managing stadium culinary operations. The Executive Chef will apply culinary techniques to food preparation and ensure high standards of production, presentation, and service.

Salary: $75-90K DOE

CANDIDATE MUST HAVE VERIFICATION

 Multi unit culinary management experience  Large catering event experience  S+E or Large venue experience 


Responsibilities:

 Ensure culinary production aligns with the Executional Framework. Establish and maintain culinary standards and techniques for food preparation. Manage a team of culinary staff to ensure quality food presentation. Train and supervise culinary and kitchen employees in best practice techniques. Provide coaching and create a shared understanding of goals and methods. Recognize and reward employees. Organize team meetings and daily huddles. Maintain staff records, including training and performance data. Develop client and guest relationships. Interact directly with guests. Stay informed about regional culinary trends. Meet food and labor targets. Focus on margin improvement and understand performance metrics. Ensure efficient execution and delivery of culinary products. Maintain food quality and safety standards. Comply with operational and safety standards. Understand and manage supply chain and procurement processes. Implement the Food Framework. Estimate food consumption and manage requisitions. Maintain equipment and ensure proper operation. Comply with food safety and quality assurance standards. Follow all applicable policies, rules, and regulations.


Qualifications

Requires at least 4 years of culinary experience

At least 2 years in a management role preferred

Requires a culinary degree or equivalent experience

Ability to multi-task

Ability to simplify the agenda for the team

Requires advanced knowledge of the principles and practices within the food profession.

This includes experiential knowledge required for management of people and/or problems.

Requires oral, reading, and written communication skills

CANDIDATE MUST HAVE VERIFICATION

 Multi unit culinary management experienceLarge catering event experienceS+E or Large venue experience


#onsite

Experience Level (if available): Associate
<JD_END>
